H0.text: Perennials are a type of plant that includes trees and shrubs.

H2.text: Annuals are trees and shrubs that are examples of a type of plant.

H3.text: Grasses are the type of plant that trees and shrubs are an example of.

A4.text: They include a wide assortment of plant groups from non-flowering plants like ferns and liverworts to highly diverse flowering plants like orchids, grasses, and woody plants.

A5.text: Woody â€“ plants with persistent above ground stem that survive from one growing season to the next, with primary and secondary growth, or growth in width protected by an outer cortex.
